title: 6-16-2021 Liberty RoundTable with Sam Bushman
creator: Loving Liberty Radio Network
subject: Podcast
description: Hour 1 * Guest: James Edwards - Race, Politics & Hypocrisy in 21st Century America - thepoliticalcesspool.org. * Moderate Pastor Ed Litton, to Head Southern Baptists - Has it become the irrelevant, feckless church? * Kevin Hart Doesn't Care About Cancel Culture - The Truth Always Wins! * Charles Barkley blasts TNT 'bosses' over cancel culture. * North Korean defector slams 'woke' US schools - Yeonmi Park said  she viewed the US as country of free thought and free speech - until she  went to college here. attended Columbia University and was immediately  struck by what she viewed as anti-Western sentiment in the classroom. * Are restaurant dress codes racist, dated? - USA Today - many have  been saying for years: dress codes are implicitly racist and target  people of color. * Hawks legend Dominique Wilkins says he was denied service - Atlanta restaurant apologizes. Hour 2 * AG Merrick Garland claims white supremacy is the greatest \"domestic  violent extremist threat\" as he unveiled the Biden administration's new  national strategy for combatting domestic terrorism. - \"In the FBI's  view, the top domestic violent extremist threat comes from racially or  ethnically motivated violent extremists, specifically those who advocate  for the superiority of the white race,\" Garland Further Dishonestly claims: The two most lethal elements of  today's domestic terrorism threat are: (1) Racially or ethnically  motivated violent extremists who advocate for the superiority of the  white race. (2) Anti-government or anti-authority violent extremists,  such as militia. * Jon Stevens, the owner of Maple Grove Farms in Minnesota, is suing  the Biden administration over a loan forgiveness that is only available  to minority farmers. * Poll: 4 in 5 Americans prefer offensive, inaccurate speech over  censorship - Only small fraction wants to let the government decide -  Art Moore, WND.com. * Senate Passes Bill Declaring Juneteenth a Federal Holiday. * 99% increase in chicken-wings prices, restaurant owner places blame. --- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/loving-liberty/support

metadata.creator: Loving Liberty Radio Network
metadata.description:
Hour 1
* Guest: James Edwards - Race, Politics & Hypocrisy in 21st Century America - thepoliticalcesspool.org.

* Moderate Pastor Ed Litton, to Head Southern Baptists - Has it become the irrelevant, feckless church?

* Kevin Hart Doesn't Care About Cancel Culture - The Truth Always Wins!

* Charles Barkley blasts TNT 'bosses' over cancel culture.

* North Korean defector slams 'woke' US schools - Yeonmi Park said  she viewed the US as country of free thought and free speech - until she  went to college here. attended Columbia University and was immediately  struck by what she viewed as anti-Western sentiment in the classroom.

* Are restaurant dress codes racist, dated? - USA Today - many have  been saying for years: dress codes are implicitly racist and target  people of color.

* Hawks legend Dominique Wilkins says he was denied service - Atlanta restaurant apologizes.

Hour 2
* AG Merrick Garland claims white supremacy is the greatest \"domestic  violent extremist threat\" as he unveiled the Biden administration's new  national strategy for combatting domestic terrorism. - \"In the FBI's  view, the top domestic violent extremist threat comes from racially or  ethnically motivated violent extremists, specifically those who advocate  for the superiority of the white race,\"

Garland Further Dishonestly claims: The two most lethal elements of  today's domestic terrorism threat are: (1) Racially or ethnically  motivated violent extremists who advocate for the superiority of the  white race. (2) Anti-government or anti-authority violent extremists,  such as militia.

* Jon Stevens, the owner of Maple Grove Farms in Minnesota, is suing  the Biden administration over a loan forgiveness that is only available  to minority farmers.

* Poll: 4 in 5 Americans prefer offensive, inaccurate speech over  censorship - Only small fraction wants to let the government decide -  Art Moore, WND.com.

* Senate Passes Bill Declaring Juneteenth a Federal Holiday.

* 99% increase in chicken-wings prices, restaurant owner places blame.

--- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/loving-liberty/support
